title: Nemesis Jax Chroma pax Brick Bug
body: I bought nemesis jax brick for IP and it gave the one of the yellow ones... i realized that it was later removed from the group of all the IP chroma packs at the top of the chroma page so they might be fixing it but idk. I have no refunds left...

replies.body: There's currently an issue with the Nemesis Jax Chroma and purchase for it has been disabled.  We'll be posting updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  We'd like to help out with your specific issue!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually.  We'll reply to your ticket asap!
So... will it be fixed? And if so, will it be available for the ip sale?
